description.other_details: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/.
Sequencing assay definition adapted from Ontology for Biomedical Investigations term. Available from: http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/OBI_0600047

details.purpose: Zur detaillierten Darstellung der Sequenzierungsanalyse an einer Probe inklusive der Aufzählung aller untersuchten Gene bei einer Panelsequenzierung.
details.use:
Zur detaillierten Darstellung der Sequenzierungsanalyse an einer Probe inklusive der Aufzählung aller untersuchten Gene bei einer Panelsequenzierung.
Eine oder mehrere Instanzen dieses Archetyps können im SLOT "Testdaten" in "OBSERVATION.laboratory_test_result" verschachtelt sein.
details.misuse: *Used only to document the analysis protocol but not to document the results of the sequence analysis. The results are documented with the archetype 'CLUSTER.genomic_variant_result'. (en)

details.purpose: For å registrere detaljer om en gensekvensanalyse / genanalyse, inkludert en liste over alle testede gener dersom en genpaneltest ble utført.
details.use:
Bruk for å registrere detaljer om en gensekvensanalyse /genanalyse, inkludert en liste over alle testede gener hvis en genpaneltest ble utført.
En eller flere forekomster av denne arketypen kan nøstes i SLOTet "Undersøkelsesdetaljer" i arketypen "OBSERVATION.laboratory_test_result" (Laboratorieresultat).
details.misuse: *Used only to document the analysis protocol but not to document the results of the sequence analysis. The results are documented with the archetype 'CLUSTER.genomic_variant_result'. (en)

details.purpose: To record details of the performed sequencing analysis including a list of all tested genes if panel sequencing was performed.
details.use:
Use to record details of the performed sequencing analysis including a list of all tested genes if panel sequencing was performed.
One or more instances of this archetype may be nested within the 'Testing details' SLOT in the OBSERVATION.laboratory_test_result.
details.misuse: Used only to document the analysis protocol but not to document the results of the sequence analysis. The results are documented with the archetype 'CLUSTER.genomic_variant_result'.

translations.author: Aurelie Tomczak
Institute of Pathology, University Hospital Heidelberg, Uniklinikum Heidelberg
au.tomczak@yahoo.com, aurelie.tomczak@med.uni-heidelberg.de

items.items: *An assay that uses sequencing technology to infer the sequence of a nucleic acid (DNA, RNA). (en)
Technologie, die zur Sequenzierung benutzt wurde.

*For example: WES, WGS, Gene panel, RNA sequencing, Fusion panel.
Coding with an external terminology is preferred, where possible. (en)
Name des Kits, das für das Experiment benutzt wurde.
Der Nukleinsäuretyp, z.B. DNA, RNA oder cf-DNA, der zur Sequenzierung verwendet wird.
Liste aller getesteten Gene, wenn eine Panel-Sequenzierung durchgeführt wurde.
Das offizielle Gensymbol, das von der HGNC genehmigt wurde und eine Kurzform des Gennamens ist.
Strukturierte Details zur Referenzsequenz des Gens.
Zusätzliche Details, die aufgezeichnet werden sollen.
Liste aller getesteten Regionen, wenn eine Panel-Sequenzierung durchgeführt wurde.
Strukturierte Details zur Referenzsequenz der Region.
*The technology platform used to perform nucleic acid sequencing. (en)
Kommentar zum Sequenzierungsassay, der nicht in anderen Feldern erfasst wurde.
Strukturierte Details zur spezifischen Version der human sequence assembly, die für die Annotation verwendet wird.

Beispiel: 'GCF_000001405.38'.
Source name: 'NCBI'. Accession number: 'GCF_000001405'. Version number: 'GCF_000001405.38'. URL: 'https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/assembly/GCF_000001405.38/'.
Strukturierte Details zum bioinformatischen Analyseworkflow oder zum verwendeten Protokoll.
An assay that uses sequencing technology to infer the sequence of a nucleic acid (DNA, RNA).
Name of the technology used for sequencing analysis.

For example: WES, WGS, Gene panel, RNA sequencing, Fusion panel.
Coding with an external terminology is preferred, where possible.
Name of the kit used for the experiment.
For example Oncomine Comprehensive Panel V3.
Type of nucleic acid used for sequencing, e.g. DNA, RNA or cf-DNA.
List of all tested genes, if panel sequencing was performed.
The official gene symbol approved by the HGNC, which is a short abbreviated form of the gene name.
Structured details on the reference sequence of the gene.
This slot is repeating to allow the description of the reference sequence using different vocabularies as source (e.g., RefSeq and Ensembl)

If panel sequencing was performed, this cluster is used to report the region(s) of interest for sequencing studies as one genomic range that identifies the parts of the reference sequence that are sequenced.
The chromosome of the tested region.
Start position of the tested region.
End position of the tested region.
Structured details on the reference sequence of the region.
The technology platform used to perform nucleic acid sequencing.
Comment on the sequencing assay that was not captured in other fields.
Structured details about the specific version of the human sequence assembly used for annotation.

For example: 'GCF_000001405.38'.
Source name: 'NCBI'. Accession number: 'GCF_000001405'. Version number: 'GCF_000001405.38'. URL: 'https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/assembly/GCF_000001405.38/'.
Structured details about the bioinformatic analysis workflow steps or the protocols that is used (e.g., devices, software, pipelines).

This slot can be used to record tools used to perform the different steps of the analysis (e.g., alignment, annotation, filtration, preprocessing, QC, variant calling) or whole pipelines.
Alignment, Annotation, Filtration, Preprocessing, QC, Variant Calling
*An assay that uses sequencing technology to infer the sequence of a nucleic acid (DNA, RNA). (en)

*For example: WES, WGS, Gene panel, RNA sequencing, Fusion panel.
Coding with an external terminology is preferred, where possible. (en)
Navnet på kitet som ble brukt til eksperimentet.
Type nukleinsyre som er brukt til sekvensanalysen, f.eks. DNA, RNA eller cf-DNA.
Liste over alle gener som ble testet hvis det ble utført en genpaneltest.
Det offisielle gensymbolet godkjent av HGNC, som er en kortform for gennavnet.
Strukturerte detaljer om referansesekvensen til genet.
Ytterligere informasjon som ikke er registrert andre steder.
Liste over alle de testede regionene hvis det ble utført en genpaneltest.
Lokalisasjonen til kromosomet i den testede regionen.
Strukturerte detaljer om referansesekvensen til regionen.
*The technology platform used to perform nucleic acid sequencing. (en)
Ytterligere fritekst om analyseresultatet som ikke fanges opp av andre elementer.
* Strukturerte detaljer om den spesifikke versjonen av XXXXXXXXX som er brukt for kommentar.

*For eksempel:
Navn på kilde: 'NCBI'. Accession number: 'GCF_000001405'. Versjonsnummer: 'GCF_000001405.38'. URL: 'https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/assembly/GCF_000001405.38/'.
Strukturerte detaljer om den bioinformatiske analyseprosessen eller protokollen som er brukt.
